title: 为什么玩家不能领取地皮
author: 水沐
txt_content: 怎么给玩家权限，让玩家可以领取地皮

replies.author: 神秘de.Tech
replies.txt_content:
给玩家权限组以下节点
plotme.use
plotme.use.add
plotme.use.remove

replies.author: 水沐
replies.txt_content:
神秘de.Tech 发表于 2017-8-8 15:20
给玩家权限组以下节点
plotme.use
plotme.use.add
怎么输入啊

replies.author: 神秘de.Tech
replies.txt_content:
水沐 发表于 2017-8-8 15:31
怎么输入啊
/mangaddp default plotme.use
/mangaddp default plotme.use.add
/mangaddp default plotme.use.remove

replies.author: 水沐
replies.txt_content:
神秘de.Tech 发表于 2017-8-8 15:20
给玩家权限组以下节点
plotme.use
plotme.use.add
可以给详细点吗

replies.author: 水沐
replies.txt_content:
神秘de.Tech 发表于 2017-8-8 15:33
/mangaddp default plotme.use
/mangaddp default plotme.use.add
/mangaddp default plotme.use.remove ...
全部输入吗

replies.author: 神秘de.Tech
replies.txt_content:
水沐 发表于 2017-8-8 15:34
全部输入吗
是的 三条指令 一个一个输入

replies.author: qyhaotime
replies.txt_content:
如果玩家是default权限组就按下面的输入，如果你不知道玩家是什么权限组，输入/list 即可知道

/mangaddp default plotme.use
/mangaddp default plotme.use.add
/mangaddp default plotme.use.remove

如果玩家是Builder权限就按照下面的输入:
/mangaddp Builder plotme.use
/mangaddp Builder plotme.use.add
/mangaddp Builder plotme.use.remove

replies.author: YXF1850343382
replies.txt_content:
在权限插件的配置文件内添加
plotme.use
plotme.use.add
plotme.use.remove

replies.author: Cu_huang
replies.txt_content:
你需要3个权限，怎么输入请按照我下面写的输入
mangaddp builder plotme.use
mangaddp builderplotme.use.add
mangaddp builderplotme.use.remove
指令不会可以联系我

replies.author: agl123456
replies.txt_content:
地皮插件有两种
一种是plotsquared
一种是plotme
如果是plotsquared，需要输入指令
mangaddp Builder plots.use
mangaddp Builder plots.plot.1
mangaddp Builder plots.permpack.basic
mangaddp Builder plots.permpack.basicinbox
如果是plotme，需要输入指令
mangaddp Builder plotme.use
mangaddp Builder plotme.limit.1
